column2: One of the fourty dragon lords from Valyria has arrived. His daughter claims that there is to be a great dom which will destroy all of Valyria. He sold all his estates in the Freehold and now demands the island and castle of Dragonstone as well as dominance over the islands of  Blackwater Bay.
Aenar took the scarcely garrisoned Dragonstone and now prepares for attack!
